meanings.definition: Restrict the inheritance of (property) to a specified line of heirs.

meanings.sent2: The trust fund is set up to entail the money to future generations.
meanings.sent3: The ancient tradition may entail passing down the family heirloom to the next generation.
meanings.sent4: The legal document will entail the distribution of assets among the designated beneficiaries.
meanings.sent5: The royal decree entails that the crown jewels are to be inherited by the rightful heir.
